explains: n. 有准备；已准备；做好准备（尤指作战准备）
wordGroup: disaster preparedness 防灾准备状态

sentences.en: Of course you will come to your discussion sections in the same state of joyful preparedness.
sentences.cn: 你们当然需要参与到讨论中来，并做好充分的课前准备。

sentences.en: The troops are in a state of preparedness.
I was surprised by his preparedness to break the law.
sentences.cn: 我对他打算以身试法感到惊讶。
